Package arcade.potts.env.location

Interface Location3D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PottsLocation3D, PottsLocations3D
    public interface Location3D
    Static location methods for 3D.

    Interface defines generalized 3D voxel methods that can be applied for both PottsLocation objects (without regions) and PottsLocations objects (with regions).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static PottsEnums.Direction[] DIRECTIONS
      List of valid 3D directions.
      static double EQUATION_PARAMETER_A
      Equation coefficient for surface area conversion.
      static double EQUATION_PARAMETER_B
      Equation offset for surface area conversion.
      static double EQUATION_PARAMETER_N
      Equation power for surface area conversion.
